title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.83 - Alternative requirements for waste classification and characteristics
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.83 - Alternative requirements for waste classification and characteristics

State Regulations

The department may, upon request or on its own
initiative, authorize other provisions for the classification and
characteristics of a specific waste on a case-by-case basis if, after
evaluation of the specific characteristics of the waste, disposal site and
method of disposal, it finds compliance with the performance objectives in
sections
382.10
-382.15 of this Part can be
reasonably ensured, and if it finds such alternative provisions are permissible
under other applicable Federal and State regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
